general.name: Head of the group for working with aggregators
general.short_description: Yandex Commercial Department is looking for a team leader. We expect the candidate to be well-versed in the digital market, understand the specifics of agency work, and be able to solve non-standard tasks.

requirements: Managed a team for two years or more
Worked with digital agencies or on their side
Quickly learns and is able to develop
Loves and knows how to build high-quality work processes and finds a common language even with the most complex client
